title: U.S. accuses Russia of planning to film false attack as pretext for Ukraine invasion
content:
1. U.S. accuses Russia of planning to film false attack as pretext for Ukraine invasion  The Washington Post
  2. US alleges Russia planning false flag operation against Ukraine using 'graphic' video  CNN
  3. U.S. Says Russia Planned to Fabricate Pretext for Invasion  The New York Times
  4. Russia-Ukraine: Pentagon says Putin 'likely' to stage 'fake attack' before invading: LIVE UPDATES  Fox News
  5. US says Russia planning video of fake Ukrainian attack with corpses, mourners to justify invasion  ABC News
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
